oai_dc:dc.dc:title: tintype of John Steele Neely, 9th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: John Steele Neely served as a Lt. in Company F, 9th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. He is listed in Tennesseans in the Civil War as J.S. Neely. Neely appears in a civilan frock coat and wears a US officer belt with two Colt revolvers in the belt. He holds a milita sword. He has a hat cord on his hat and the tassles hang to the side. The 9th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA hailed from West Tennessee and fought in most of the battles of the Army of Tennessee. Little of Neely's service is known.
